0:
[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.title: home-assistant helm release
/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.name: home-assistant
/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn

0:
dn: ${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
dc: tinfoilforest
o: Tinfoilforest
objectclass: top
objectclass: dcObject
objectclass: organization

dn: ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: people

dn: ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: groups

dn: cn=ben,ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
gidNumber: 8742
objectclass: top
objectclass: posixGroup

dn: uid=ben,ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
givenName: Ben
sn: ben
uid: ben
uidNumber: 8742
gidNumber: 8742
homeDirectory: /home/ben
loginShell: /bin/bash
mail: "${SECRET_ADMIN_EMAIL}"
objectClass: top
objectClass: inetOrgPerson
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
userPassword: {SSHA}x

dn: cn=ness,ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ness
gidNumber: 8743
objectclass: top
objectclass: posixGroup

dn: uid=ness,ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ness
givenName: ness
sn: ness
uid: ness
uidNumber: 8743
gidNumber: 8743
homeDirectory: /home/ness
loginShell: /bin/bash
mail: ${SECRET_PARTNER_EMAIL}
objectClass: top
objectClass: inetOrgPerson
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
userPassword: {SSHA}x

[GTX2]
  driver = snmp-ups
  mibs = ietf
  desc = "Liebert GXT2-1500RT"
  snmp_version = v2c
  community = milton
  port = 192.168.30.120
  pollfreq = 15

- job_name: node-exporter
  honor_labels: true
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  metrics_path: /metrics
  scheme: http
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "10.5.0.10:9100"

player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.creative
  - slashserver.survival
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN} lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mccr-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Survival'
    address: mc-survival-minecraft:25565
    restricted: true
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN3} &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  EthanDstroyr:
  - admin
